vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.9.1;
son of: Becorath (H1064);
father of: Abiel (H0022)
§ Zeror = "bundle"
n pr m
grandfather of Ḳish
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Becorat; ancestro del rey Saúl; tribu de Benjamín
